data.name: Ancient Den
data.flavor_text: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

data.name: Azor's Gateway // Sanctum of the Sun

card_faces.name: Azor's Gateway
card_faces.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different mana values are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

card_faces.name: Sanctum of the Sun
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.
card_faces.flavor_text: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.

card_faces.name: Conqueror's Galleon
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Conqueror's Galleon attacks, exile it at end of combat, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card_faces.name: Conqueror's Foothold
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Conqueror's Galleon.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}: Draw a card.
{6}, {T}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Darkmoss Bridge
data.oracle_text:
Darkmoss Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
data.flavor_text: The path to power is forged in ruthlessness.

data.name: Darksteel Citadel
data.flavor_text: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

card_faces.name: Dowsing Dagger
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Dowsing Dagger enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 0/2 green Plant creature tokens with defender.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may transform Dowsing Dagger.
Equip {2}

card_faces.name: Lost Vale
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Dowsing Dagger.)
{T}: Add three mana of any one color.
card_faces.flavor_text: The pirates had ventured into the interior for treasure. They found something far greater.

data.name: Drossforge Bridge
data.oracle_text:
Drossforge Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
data.flavor_text: The path to ruin is forged in pain.

card_faces.name: Golden Guardian
card_faces.oracle_text:
Defender
{2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card_faces.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
{4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
card_faces.flavor_text: An army of living gold for the golden city.

data.name: Goldmire Bridge
data.oracle_text:
Goldmire Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
data.flavor_text: The path to glory is forged in ambition.

data.name: Great Furnace
data.set_name: Heads I Win, Tails You Lose
data.flavor_text: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

card_faces.name: Hostile Hostel
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a soul counter on Hostile Hostel. Then if there are three or more soul counters on it, remove those counters, transform it, then untap it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card_faces.name: Creeping Inn
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever Creeping Inn attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creature cards exiled with Creeping Inn.
{4}: Creeping Inn phases out.

Indestructible
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

data.name: Power Depot
data.oracle_text:
Power Depot enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
Modular 1

card_faces.name: Primal Amulet
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Primal Amulet. Then if there are four or more charge counters on it, you may remove those counters and transform it.

card_faces.name: Primal Wellspring
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Primal Amulet.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color. When that mana is spent to cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card_faces.name: Thaumatic Compass
card_faces.oracle_text:
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control seven or more lands, transform Thaumatic Compass.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Clearly, it indicates the aetheric azimuth of . . ."
—Jace Beleren

card_faces.name: Treasure Map
card_faces.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Scry 1. Put a landmark counter on Treasure Map. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform Treasure Map, and create three Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card_faces.name: Treasure Cove
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Treasure Map.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.
card_faces.flavor_text: Half the treasure is the glory of finding it.

data.name: Treasure Vault
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifice Treasure Vault: Create X Treasure tokens.
data.flavor_text: There is wealth enough inside to cause the rise and the ruin of dynasties.

data.name: Tree of Tales
